game.name: Chicken Craft
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Chicken Craft는 판타지 과학 농장에서 귀여운 닭 몬스터를 부화시키는 경영 게임입니다.독특한 품종을 발견하고, 다양한 돌연변이를 해제하며, 물약을 만들고 당신만의 특별한 닭을 창조하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chicken Craft is a management game where you hatch cute chicken monsters on a fantasy science farm. Discover unique breeds, unlock various mutations, brew potions and create your very own chickens!
